attributes.action: Hold a public enquiry into the sexual abuse of children in Rotherham.
attributes.additional_details: As time progresses the more disturbing it becomes as to the lack of a coordinated response to criminal gangs abusing young children
attributes.background:
There is an ongoing issue of lack of public disclosure of child abuse by the authorities in Rotherham, social services, police and council. 
A full judge led public enquiry will give us the opportunity to examine
not only what went wrong but also learn lessons for the future.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There is already an established inquiry into child sexual abuse in England and Wales, which is able to cover this issue. You can find out more here:

https://www.iicsa.org.uk/
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
